name: Shotgun Ex 2
description:
Shotgun Ex 2

Controls: Mouse & Keyboard

How To Play

You are alone against a haunted building full of ghosts and ghouls that lie in constant ambush. Your job is to find their leader, and terminate it. Go into the elevator and search for hall passes to enter barriers of the same colour.

Control Scheme

* WASD to move

* Point and click to shoot

* R to Reload

* SPACE to cartwheel (to pass through enemies and dodge bullets)

* F to switch shotgun (once you find more)

* ESC to pause the game
